name: anchr
description: Anchr is a lightweight personal bookmark and URL shortener service. It allows storing, tagging, and sharing bookmarks, shortening links, and managing them via a simple self-hosted web interface with REST API support.

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Store and organize all your important links. Never lose a URL again

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize bookmarks with flexible tagging for quick discovery. Find anything instantly

features.title: REST API
features.description: Programmatic access for automation and integrations. Extend functionality easily

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your bookmarks private on your own server. Your links, your control

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Clean web UI makes managing links effortless. No learning curve

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage, runs on modest hardware. Fast and efficient
